Name: Ambrosia Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Easy-drinking but complex with a herbal edge.
History: Created by yours truly and named after the Greek for "elixir of life, the food of the Gods." However, here in the UK, "Ambrosia" is a brand of custard, so advocaat seemed an appropriate ingredient. And if there is a God, he/she/it surely drinks Chartreuse.
